title: for those stuck at 60 fps, and recently got Razer Cortex
body:
to fix this, go to control panel. 
Go to Power options, and you will see 4 options instead of 3
Click on high performance, and switch off the "Razer Cortex Battery Plan" 

your game should be back to normal now
